title: RDBMS vs Graph Database Performance Comparison
description: Interactive chart demonstrating the exponential performance degradation of RDBMS JOIN queries compared to constant-time graph database traversals for multi-hop relationship queries.
subject: Mathematics
topic: RDBMS vs Graph Database Performance Comparison
author: Dan McCreary
learningObjectives: Understand the mathematical concept of rdbms vs graph database performance comparison
Apply rdbms vs graph database performance comparison to solve problems
Visualize and interpret rdbms vs graph database performance comparison relationships
Experiment with parameters to observe their effects on rdbms vs graph database performance comparison
